note:
Former enemy of the people, now just mostly an annoyance. Digital news pioneer. Cancer survivor. COVID survivor. Newspaper journalism survivor. Would-be traveler.

Held senior positions at startribune.com, Cox, Morris.

I've led workshops and training for journalists in the USA, UK, France, Germany, Switzerland, Spain, India, Ukraine, Macau and Malaysia. These days I'm mostly retired.

Liberated to have political opinions.

Based in Savannah, GA, USA.

Searchable by tootfinder
